title: Batman.v.Superman-Dawn of Justice.2016.720P.HDTS.x264.AC3.HQ.Hiv
description:
http://boltimg.com/image/pvUw

Batman.v.Superman-Dawn of Justice.2016.720P.HDTS.x264.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time 

Sources:

Video: New 1080p HDCAM thx m8

Audio: Sweet Direct Line Big Thx to Exclusive + Cadance Line



Notes:
I could have been first with the good unmarked latino cam when the chinese one appeared
but i decided to wait for a 1080p source instead, thats worth of that big movie blockbuster, so i waited

finally got the good one when the latino dropped, which had great quality, its as good as it gets that early. 
had english screentext with english subs when needed already hardcoded

I maybe last to release but definately best.This movie is too big to waste on low quality reencodes.

Nothing cropped around, no constant heads in the view, no flicker, no movements, no focus issues
it only had way too much luma and a bit reddish, which is fixable though

Another perfect release, best possible Video and best possible Line combined.
One good release is the way to go, patience
thx for everyone involved


Encode:
Fixed brightness,contrast,black base, white base and rgb.
have done a 720p version for the quality hunters, and a normal avi for the majority
both have nice quality

Had a nice line from cadance ready, but in the end the Exclusive Audio was better so i went with that
Thx to both guys for getting quality stuff, you are much appreciated.

Exclusive Audio was missing 7secs of Audio on a spot, replaced it with cadance line.
Video is complete nothing is missing


wont get better than this till retail
enjoy

Video: 1280x576 @bitrate 4000-8000
Audio: Line AC3 2.0 Stereo
Sample: yes included
